home.welcomeTitle: Welcome to Share-A-Review - The Voice of the Community!
home.subtitle: Share your reviews and experiences with the world
home.welcomeMessage: Discover a space where your opinions truly matter! At Share-A-Review, we believe that every review can make a difference. Whether you're a tech enthusiast, movie buff, food lover, or simply someone eager to share your experiences, our platform is made for you.
home.description: Share-A-Review is a community where you can share your reviews and experiences with the world. You can also read reviews and experiences shared by others. You can also rate and comment on reviews shared by others.

writeReview.loginRequired: You need to be logged in to write a review. Please log in or sign up.
writeReview.isLoggedIn: You are logged in as {{name}}. You can now write a review.
writeReview.title: Write a Review
writeReview.description: Write a review about a movie, book, music, game, product, place, restaurant, recipe, video, app, service, event, electronics, or anything else.

search.placeholder: Search for an item by name, by category ...

createFolder.title: Create Folder
createFolder.description: Create a new folder to organize your notifications
createFolder.name: Folder Name

footer.title: Share-A-Review Community
footer.description: Share-A-Review is a community where you can share your reviews and experiences with the world. You can also read reviews and experiences shared by others. You can also rate and comment on reviews shared by others.
